DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-102
DataSourceDefinition.Expression: SELECT val_codi_vent, descripcion, unidad_negocio, ( select op.COD_OPER from rec_opera op where op.OID_OPER = %value_OPERACION1VALUE% ) cod_operacion_1, ( select val_i18n from v_gen_i18n_sicc where attr_enti = 'REC_OPERA' and val_oid = %value_OPERACION1VALUE% and idio_oid_idio = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% )desc_operacion_1, ( select op.COD_OPER from rec_opera op where op.OID_OPER = %value_OPERACION2VALUE% ) cod_operacion_2, ( select val_i18n from v_gen_i18n_sicc where attr_enti = 'REC_OPERA' and val_oid = %value_OPERACION2VALUE% and idio_oid_idio = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% )desc_operacion_2, ( select op.COD_OPER from rec_opera op where op.OID_OPER = %value_OPERACION3VALUE% ) cod_operacion_3, ( select val_i18n from v_gen_i18n_sicc where attr_enti = 'REC_OPERA' and val_oid = %value_OPERACION3VALUE% and idio_oid_idio = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% )desc_operacion_3, ( select op.COD_OPER from rec_opera op where op.OID_OPER = %value_OPERACION4VALUE% ) cod_operacion_4, ( select val_i18n from v_gen_i18n_sicc where attr_enti = 'REC_OPERA' and val_oid = %value_OPERACION4VALUE% and idio_oid_idio = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% )desc_operacion_4, unidades_facturadas, unidades_1, unidades_2, unidades_3, unidades_4, suma_unidades, por_total_unidades FROM (select val_codi_vent, descripcion, unidad_negocio, sum(NUM_UNID_ATEN)unidades_facturadas, sum(operacion_1) as unidades_1, sum(operacion_2) as unidades_2, sum(operacion_3) as unidades_3, sum(operacion_4) as unidades_4, nvl(sum(operacion_1),0) + nvl(sum(operacion_2),0) + nvl(sum(operacion_3),0) + nvl(sum(operacion_4),0) suma_unidades, DECODE( nvl(sum(operacion_1),0) + nvl(sum(operacion_2),0) + nvl(sum(operacion_3),0) + nvl(sum(operacion_4),0),0,0, nvl(sum(NUM_UNID_ATEN),0) / (nvl(sum(operacion_1),0) + nvl(sum(operacion_2),0) + nvl(sum(operacion_3),0) + nvl(sum(operacion_4),0)) )*100 por_total_unidades from ( select gen_prod.descripcion, of_det.val_codi_vent, gen_un_neg.unidad_negocio, fac_lin.NUM_UNID_ATEN, decode(t_op.ROPE_OID_OPER,%value_OPERACION1VALUE%,lin_rec.NUM_UNID_RECL,0) operacion_1, decode(t_op.ROPE_OID_OPER,%value_OPERACION2VALUE%,lin_rec.NUM_UNID_RECL,0) operacion_2, decode(t_op.ROPE_OID_OPER,%value_OPERACION3VALUE%,lin_rec.NUM_UNID_RECL,0) operacion_3, decode(t_op.ROPE_OID_OPER,%value_OPERACION4VALUE%,lin_rec.NUM_UNID_RECL,0) operacion_4 from rec_cabec_recla cab_rec, rec_opera_recla op_rec, rec_linea_opera_recla lin_rec, REC_TIPOS_OPERA t_op, fac_docum_conta_cabec fac, fac_docum_conta_linea fac_lin, mae_produ prod, ped_solic_posic pos, ped_solic_cabec sol, ped_tipo_solic_pais t_sol_p, ped_tipo_solic t_sol, pre_ofert_detal of_det, cra_perio per, ( select oid_peri, fec_inic, fec_fina from cra_perio where oid_peri = %value_PERIODOINICIALVALUE% )per_ini, ( select oid_peri, fec_inic, fec_fina from cra_perio where oid_peri = %value_PERIODOFINALVALUE% )per_fin, ( select val_oid, val_i18n descripcion from v_gen_i18n_sicc where attr_enti = 'MAE_PRODU' and idio_oid_idio = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% )gen_prod, ( select val_oid, val_i18n unidad_negocio from v_gen_i18n_sicc where attr_enti = 'MAE_UNIDA_NEGOC' and idio_oid_idio = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% )gen_un_neg where cab_rec.OID_CABE_RECL = op_rec.CARE_OID_CABE_RECL and op_rec.OID_OPER_RECL = lin_rec.OPRE_OID_OPER_RECL and op_rec.TIOP_OID_TIPO_OPER = t_op.OID_TIPO_OPER and lin_rec.PROD_OID_PROD = prod.OID_PROD and prod.OID_PROD = gen_prod.val_oid(+) and prod.UNEG_OID_UNID_NEGO = gen_un_neg.val_oid(+) and sol.oid_soli_cabe = pos.soca_oid_soli_cabe and fac.SOCA_OID_SOLI_CABE(+) = cab_rec.soca_oid_soli_cabe and fac.OID_CABE = fac_lin.DCCA_OID_CABE(+) and cab_rec.soca_oid_soli_cabe = sol.soca_oid_soli_cabe and sol.TSPA_OID_TIPO_SOLI_PAIS = t_sol_p.oid_tipo_soli_pais and t_sol_p.TSOL_OID_TIPO_SOLI = t_sol.oid_tipo_soli and pos.OFDE_OID_DETA_OFER = of_det.OID_DETA_OFER and cab_rec.PERD_OID_PERI_DOCU_REFE = per.oid_peri and per_ini.fec_inic <= per.fec_inic and per.fec_fina <= per_fin.fec_fina and per.marc_oid_marc =%value_MARCAVALUE% and per.cana_oid_cana = %value_CANALVALUE% and cab_rec.pais_oid_pais = %value_PAISVALUE% %start_UNIDADNEGOCIOVALUES% and prod.UNEG_OID_UNID_NEGO in (%value_UNIDADNEGOCIOVALUES%) %end_UNIDADNEGOCIOVALUES% %start_ACCESOVALUES% and t_sol.acce_oid_acce in (%value_ACCESOVALUES%) %end_ACCESOVALUES% ) group by unidad_negocio, val_codi_vent, descripcion order by unidad_negocio, unidades_facturadas %start_CRITERIODEORDENAMIENTOVALUE% ,%value_CRITERIODEORDENAMIENTOVALUE% %end_CRITERIODEORDENAMIENTOVALUE%) WHERE ROWNUM <= %value_CANTIDADPRODUCTOSVALUE%
